rows.label: qst202319_msg001
rows.name: Yaegiri's final attack was super-duper!

rows.label: qst202319_msg002
rows.name:
No kidding. You made me feel sorry for
the poor little Thanatobeast.

rows.label: qst202319_msg003
rows.name:
Did that monster-bashing make
Yaegiri happy?

rows.label: qst202319_msg004
rows.name: Hmmm... Well, honestly, not so much.

rows.label: qst202319_msg005
rows.name: What?!

rows.label: qst202319_msg006
rows.name:
That's not what your face was saying,
Yaegiri.

rows.label: qst202319_msg007
rows.name:
Well, okay, that one attack did feel
pretty good.

rows.label: qst202319_msg008
rows.name:
I mean... Everyone pitched in on that
battle. We did it together.

rows.label: qst202319_msg009
rows.name:
So, I can't really take all the credit,
can I?

rows.label: qst202319_msg010
rows.name: Huh? Really?

rows.label: qst202319_msg011
rows.name: I'm just saying how it is!

rows.label: qst202319_msg012
rows.name:
It's a one-on-one slugfest that I really
crave!

rows.label: qst202319_msg013
rows.name:
So, yeah! I've gotta find something even
stronger than that wimpy Thanatobeast
and defeat it with my own strength.

rows.label: qst202319_msg014
rows.name:
I mean... She'll never respect me as a
rival if I don't prove myself...

rows.label: qst202319_msg015
rows.name:
Yaegiri... Do you want to take Hikari
on, maybe?

rows.label: qst202319_msg016
rows.name:
Yaegiri... Are you spoiling for a ruck
with Hikari or something?

rows.label: qst202319_msg017
rows.name:
Now I understand. You want to fight
Hikari, don't you?

rows.label: qst202319_msg018
rows.name:
Yaegiri... Are you looking for a scrap
with Hikari?

rows.label: qst202319_msg019
rows.name:
Well, maybe... But I mean...now's not
the right time.

rows.label: qst202319_msg020
rows.name: Not the right time?

rows.label: qst202319_msg021
rows.name:
I...I'm not strong enough yet...
There's no way I could stand up to the
Holy Grail.

rows.label: qst202319_msg022
rows.name: So I've gotta get a whole lot stronger!

rows.label: qst202319_msg023
rows.name:
If there's another powerful monster
out there, then I want to take it on!

rows.label: qst202319_msg024
rows.name:
I bet there's a bunch of crazy-tough
battles out there just waiting for us!

rows.label: qst202319_msg025
rows.name:
Got the message loud and clear!
Yaegiri, with you around, there's
nothing to be scared of.

rows.label: qst202319_msg026
rows.name:
Ah... I doubt I can talk you out of it...
But I've no fear of any monster with
you backing me up!

rows.label: qst202319_msg027
rows.name:
Understood. Well, Yaegiri...we need
fear no monster with you on our side.

rows.label: qst202319_msg028
rows.name:
Well, if we do bump into anything like
that, I'm sure you'll be able to sort
them out in a jif, Yaegiri!

rows.label: qst202319_msg029
rows.name: Teeheehee...!

rows.label: qst202319_msg030
rows.name:
I knew I could count on my Driver!
And you can count on me too!
